original_text: I will put my Spirit in you, so that you obey my commands. You will be careful to obey my laws.
korean_text: 또 내 영을 너희 속에 두어 너희로 내 율례를 행하게 하리니 너희가 내 규례를 지켜 행할지라

sentences.original_text: I will put my Spirit in you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 내 영을 너희 속에 두겠고

sentences.original_text: so that you obey my commands
You will be careful to obey my laws
